unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Swordfish Growth Rates
question_text:
A marine biologist was interested in the average annual growth rate of swordfish.
A sampling of $16\text{ tagged swordfish}$ found a mean growth rate of $1.4\text{ feet}$ with a standard deviation of $0.23\text{ feet}$. The confidence interval estimated the true mean growth rate is most likely somewhere between $1.2306$ and $1.5694\text{ feet}$.
The given interval has what level of confidence?
